t.t-if: beneficiary_data and (beneficiary_data.firstName or beneficiary_data.middleName or beneficiary_data.lastName)

span.t-esc: (beneficiary_data.firstName if beneficiary_data.firstName else '') +' ' + (beneficiary_data.middleName if beneficiary_data.middleName else '' )+' '+ (beneficiary_data.lastName if beneficiary_data.lastName else '')

t.t-if: spouse_data and (spouse_data.firstName or spouse_data.middleName or spouse_data.lastName)

span.t-esc: (spouse_data.firstName if spouse_data.firstName else '') +' ' + (spouse_data.middleName if spouse_data.middleName else '' )+' '+ (spouse_data.lastName if spouse_data.lastName else '')

t.t-if: spouse_data and (spouse_data.firstName or spouse_data.middleName or spouse_data.lastName)

span.t-esc: (spouse_data.firstName if spouse_data.firstName else '') +' ' + (spouse_data.middleName if spouse_data.middleName else '' )+' '+ (spouse_data.lastName if spouse_data.lastName else '')

t.t-if: beneficiary_data and (beneficiary_data.firstName or beneficiary_data.middleName or beneficiary_data.lastName)

span.t-esc: (beneficiary_data.firstName if beneficiary_data.firstName else '') +' ' + (beneficiary_data.middleName if beneficiary_data.middleName else '' )+' '+ (beneficiary_data.lastName if beneficiary_data.lastName else '')

t.t-if: beneficiary_data and beneficiary_data.firstName or beneficiary_data.middleName or beneficiary_data.lastName

span.t-esc: (beneficiary_data.firstName if beneficiary_data.firstName else '') +' ' + (beneficiary_data.middleName if beneficiary_data.middleName else '' )+' '+ (beneficiary_data.lastName if beneficiary_data.lastName else '')

span.b: .أرجو تنظيم وثيقة الطلاق اللازمة لتسجيله في المديرية العامة للأحوال الشخصية في لبنان :

p.b: رقم وثيقة الطلاق المنظمة في البعثة :
